localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Unlike most calendars, Daybridge doesn’t confine you to a half-empty grid. So you’re free to structure your day exactly how you like. Mix events, tasks, and notes together in the same place.
blogPost.body: Unlike most calendars, Daybridge doesn’t confine you to a half-empty grid. So you’re free to structure your day exactly how you like. Mix events, tasks, and notes together in the same place.
blogPost.title: Daybridge - A calendar built for people, not companies.
blogPost.author: Jeff Eisley

localize.description: 与大多数日历不同的是，Daybridge 不会将你限制在一个半空的格子里。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好来安排一天的工作。你可以将事件、任务和笔记混合在同一个地方。
localize.tagline: 一个为人而不是为公司打造的日历。

localize.description: 與大多數日曆不同的是，Daybridge 不會將你限制在一個半空的格子裏。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好來安排一天的工作。你可以將事件、任務和筆記混合在同一個地方。
localize.tagline: 一個爲人而不是爲公司打造的日曆。

previous.excerpt: This is a twitter bot that helps you find your next internship. Mention the bot in any intern hiring tweet to amplify it. Follow the bot to get internship opportunities.
previous.title: InternFinder - Bot that helps you amplify as well as find new internships.

localize.description: 这是一个帮助你找到下一份实习工作的微博机器人。在任何招聘实习生的推特上提到这个机器人，就可以放大它。关注该机器人，获得实习机会。
localize.tagline: 帮助你放大以及寻找新的实习机会的机器人。

localize.description: 這是一個幫助你找到下一份實習工作的微博機器人。在任何招聘實習生的推特上提到這個機器人，就可以放大它。關注該機器人，獲得實習機會。
localize.tagline: 幫助你放大以及尋找新的實習機會的機器人。

next.excerpt: LecturePro is a notes-assistant that helps students pay attention in class. It listens to the lecture with you, and also takes notes for you. You can download these notes and edit as well!
next.title: Lecture Pro - Notes-assistant for students across the globe!

localize.description: LecturePro是一款帮助学生在课堂上专心听讲的笔记助手。它和你一起听课，还能为你做笔记。你可以下载这些笔记，也可以进行编辑!
LecturePro是一款幫助學生在課堂上專心聽講的筆記助手。它和你一起聽課，還能爲你做筆記。你可以下載這些筆記，也可以進行編輯!
